ComicInfo.Summary:
Part three of the Battle Void arc! As the newest member of the top tier, uber-elite citizens, ZIM is crowned the king of... security? Apparently the great leader thinks he's better than ZIM at ruling worlds and ranking citizens, but ZIM's gonna show him... by completely ignoring all of his security responsibilities. And hey, remember Dib? He's gonna lead the resistance to go take down the leader once and for all! All he needs is a gap in security...
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Maddie C. (a) & Fred C. Stresing (c) | 1 | B | Cover B | Marcy Bones | 2 |

ComicInfo.Characters: Dib Membrane, GIR, Recap Kid, Zim
